title: New: Them 9's – Drunk
body:
Image: Scott Leonard

Australia showcasing yet again why it’s the most exciting place on the planet for new music at this moment in time.

**Them 9’s**, pals of CitR favourites [**Bel Air**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/22018-new-bel-air-song-a/), have revamped their line-up, and their sound, pulling down all previous traces of the band, and starting afresh with blistering new single _Drunk_. Lamenting lost loves and the ease of turning to the bottle, it’s four minutes of thrillingly addictive indie-pop, complete with epic, rousing guitar lines, touching upon, dare I say it, Kings of Leon territory at points. Check out _Drunk_ below.
